channel.title: Nothing here. on
channel.description: Recent content in Nothing here. on

item.title: Previous Forecasts
item.description: The following forecasts were run with panels I organized. I maintain a private mailing list where I announce and organize these forecasts. If you’re into this sort of thing, you can reach out to me and ask to be added. Also see: Scoring and Calibration Standards for “in-the-wild”. Scoreboard # Short name Score Chrome Q2 2019 0.043 Bluekeep 0.706 Enigma Firefox 0.

item.title: Standards for "In-The-Wild"
item.description: This document guides a forecaster towards judgement of a vulnerability or exploit’s “in the wild” status. This term is used with many definitions and is not well standardized. The intent is to act as a more stable target for forecasting and is not intending on being more than that. Keep using “in the wild” however you want, this is simply judgement criteria for forecasters and a specific use case. An in the wild vulnerability.
